column4: hi, I can't get my bluetooth adapter to be recognized with Karmic's newer kernels. The last one I got it working it, was the 2.6.31 from beta stage
how can I debug this, so can I open a proper bug?
official karmic kernels? or selfbuild kernels?
official karmic kernels. I also lost ability to use my wifi killswitch (which also works with the old .31)
